37.heading: DETECTIVE AND MYSTERY COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
37.title: Arctic Nation
37.author: Juan Diaz Canales, writer ; Juanjo Guarnido, artist and colorist ; translated by Anthya Flores & Patricia Rivera.
notes: "In a town where white supremacists have moved in and are brutally seizing control, Blacksad is asked to find a kidnapped child and bring the kidnappers to justice. As he gets deeper into his investigation, Blacksad discovers a tale of sickening horror involving murder and worse that condemns some of the town's most powerful citizens."

72.heading: DETECTIVE AND MYSTERY COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
72.title: Bison
72.author: Clayton, Dows, Campbell, Townsend.
notes: "Jack Bison is the kind of guy they don't make anymore. A hard-boiled, take-no-prisoners cop out to avenge the death of his wife at the hands of crime boss Enrique Esposito. But when he's fired from his beloved force, he needs a new angle of attack, and the body-swapping technology of Internet 4 has the answer. Now, Bison plans to swap with Esposito's daughter, Charisma; but she has her own plans for Jack Bison's body."

154.title: Detective and Mystery Comic Books, Strips, Etc.
notes:
This is a broadly defined genre for purposes of this index, including both ratiocinating and hard-boiled detection, as well as spooky mysteries, crime, and police procedural stories. An alphabetical title list begins below this box, but please check here first for titles that have been removed from the longer list because they have their own sites in this index:
